title: Real time data sharing with Sage cloud based (Aida Thomas)
text: By Aida Thomas Sep 11, 2015 Sage is a unique accounting software application product in the industry. It's an enterprise solution for companies to operate their accounts and finances. Customers are offered with two choice to get Sage products, online hosting on cloud servers or traditional on premise hosting by the owners. A user is free to choose and does not have to sign up contracts to purchase a license. Sage license is valid till the customer wants to use the application. Customers can pay the license rental on subscription and continue to access the web application till required. Anytime a user can exit the services and there is no penalty to get out of the services. Monthly subscription offers flexibility to pay the rentals and no burdens of heavy rentals. This way a company and Sage work smoothly as partners. A business might be small or medium can get advantages of working on cloud with Sage product. Purchasing a license of Sage is easy online. A firm can purchase multiple license copy based on company requirements and simultaneously all the relevant users can share the real time application online. New users willing to get sage product license can purchase and Sage offers online discounts for the new clients.Someone new to accounting product can install a free trial version on his device. It's free to work with this application for thirty days and thereafter users can get a new license copy to become Sage customers. Sage cloud based services can be accessed online as it's hosted on web remote servers. Remote web location offers data security and reliability to the company business and users can trust the hosting service providers who deliver full time customer support for all its customers. They are efficient managers of business and completely ensure data protection. They offer data recovery system too if in case there is any loss of data. Hosting company provides full time backup to data for their clients. Users can access the same online from anywhere with any device having a browser and internet connection. A strong reliable internet network connection is recommended to get Sage cloud based services.Sage cloud based is hosting on cloud servers where clients can seek Sage application online. It works same as when a user is accessing Google services, Gmail or Hotmail online. Sage is agile software product hosted online or in-house is cost effective services for customers. Users have ease of use of the application when accessed from cloud. Cloud Sage is accessible from anywhere, anytime which means it's online so that most of the users have ease of access. With a web browser and small device, users can connect instantly and get connected to the application updates instantly. Sage keeps on improving the features of the product and introduces new add-ons, add-ins which enhances the efficiency of the product. Sage consists of all the basic modules of accounting like payments, inventory, reporting and more. Based on business requirements, these are customized as well to deliver whichever needed. About the Author Aida Thomas is an IT analyst working with SageNext Infotech LLC. SageNext provides Sage Cloud based and QuickBooks cloud server services. Her extensive industry experience can easily be seen in her articles, blogs etc which have been proven as a knowledgeable resource for every individuals. Rating:
